sentences.en: Affidavit of Support and Guarantee executed by the Philippine travel agent.
sentences.cn: 菲律宾旅行社经过公证的保证书.

sentences.en: Can I have a look at the Affidavit of Support?
sentences.cn: 我能看看书面担保书 吗 ?
费尔福特把宣誓书匆匆看了一遍.

sentences.en: I gave an affidavit to the judge about the accident I witnessed.
sentences.cn: 我向法官提交了一份关于我目击的事故的证词.

sentences.en: In his sworn affidavit, Roche outlined a history of actions against him by the church.
sentences.cn: 在其宣誓了的书面陈述中，罗奇罗列了教会反对他的行动经过。

sentences.en: Is that how the affidavit printed the word?
sentences.cn: 那份宣誓书是怎样印刷这个词的?

sentences.en: Mr. Harjani , in the affidavit, said he believed the credit line would pay for the stocks.
sentences.cn: 哈加尼在证词中说,他相信可用美林的授信资金购买这部分股票.

sentences.en: The affidavit was formally read to the court.
sentences.cn: 书面证词正式向出席法庭的人宣读了.

sentences.en: The appeal is adjourned for affidavit to be obtained.
sentences.cn: 为获得宣誓书,上诉被推迟.

sentences.en: The lower court found that the judgment was invalid due to problems with an affidavit.
sentences.cn: 下级法院(俄勒冈地区法院)认定该判决无效,因为一份宣誓书存在问题.

sentences.en: Type your name here to indicate that you have read and agree to this affidavit.
sentences.cn: 在此处键入您的姓名以表示您已阅读并同意本担保书.

sentences.en: You can sign the affidavit, and split.
sentences.cn: 你可以签下宣誓书就走.

trans.tran_en: a written statement that you swear is true, for use as proof in a court of law
